body_html:
So what is the issue here? Does TF prefer to move ONNX to another repo in order to prevent better interoperability? Are you guys doing the same thing that Microsoft did 10/20 years ago with Office and the .doc/.docx format (and that's only an example among many others)?

Apologize if the issue is only technicals but as a TF user I am really in favour of interoperability and that's what ONNX is all about.
body_text:
So what is the issue here? Does TF prefer to move ONNX to another repo in order to prevent better interoperability? Are you guys doing the same thing that Microsoft did 10/20 years ago with Office and the .doc/.docx format (and that's only an example among many others)?
Apologize if the issue is only technicals but as a TF user I am really in favour of interoperability and that's what ONNX is all about.
body:
So what is the issue here? Does TF prefer to move ONNX to another repo in order to prevent better interoperability? Are you guys doing the same thing that Microsoft did 10/20 years ago with Office and the `.doc`/`.docx` format (and that's only an example among many others)?

Apologize if the issue is only technicals but as a TF user I am really in favour of interoperability and that's what ONNX is all about.
